sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 14:18  
sdumitriu - (14:31): vmassol: Ping  
vmassol - (14:32): sdumitriu: yes?  
sdumitriu - (14:32): In platform/core/pom.xml, why do we declare both jmock-1.2 and 2.5 as test dependencies?  
vmassol - (14:33): no idea, probably because both are used  
vmassol - (14:33): if it can be slimmed down please go ahead  
vmassol - (14:34): sdumitriu: will you have committed everything for 2.6RC2 before EOF today?  
sdumitriu - (14:35): Hopefully  
vmassol - (14:35): I won't be able to work over the week end  
vmassol - (14:35): so if I have to do the release tomorrow I need to start early  
sdumitriu - (14:35): I wanted to show what I have so far, but the router here has a crappy administration UI, I can't easily forward a port  
vmassol - (14:35): so we need to ensure everything builds fine before EOF today  
vmassol - (14:35): (build = build + tests)  
vmassol - (14:38): sdumitriu: just received a mail :)  
sdumitriu - (14:38): Yep, just sent it  
sdumitriu - (14:38): WDYT?  
vmassol - (14:38): (but I can't click since the url is local)  
vmassol - (14:38): sounds good to me for now  
sdumitriu - (14:39): Found lots of problems while working onit  
sdumitriu - (14:39): It will need lots of improvements in the next release  
sdumitriu - (14:39): Like, I can't include a PDF right now  
sdumitriu - (14:40): I can't get one from the Export class, and I can't attach one to the mail  
sdumitriu - (14:40): The user suggest is almost doing more damage than it helps at the moment  
vmassol - (14:43): you talked about it to jvelociter?  
vmassol - (14:43): (is that what jerome modified?)  
sdumitriu - (14:44): Well, those were regressions, this is more like incomplete behavior  
sdumitriu - (14:44): If I write an email address in the field and press enter, nothing happens, since the suggest is telling me that "no users found", and I can't select any entry  
sdumitriu - (14:45): I have to press Esc to close the suggest, then Enter to add that email address  
sdumitriu - (14:45): It can be used, but it's quirky  
sdumitriu - (14:45): Plus, user suggests only accepts and displays usernames, not real names  
sdumitriu - (14:46): It's not OK for the target audience  
sburjan left at 14:47 (Quit: Ex-Chat  
jvelociter - (15:06): sdumitriu: wanted to fix that in uorgsuggest.vm but the rightsmanager API use a logical AND instead of a OR  
jvelociter - (15:06): so it's a pity to fix  
jvelociter - (15:07): would mean new APIs in the old module or new module  
jvelociter - (15:07): I share your view anyways, fixing this is a must  
sdumitriu - (15:07): I'd rather migrate it to REST  
jvelociter - (15:07): yes. would need a user resource

sdumitriu - (22:26): evalica: Ping  
flaviusolaru joined #xwiki at 22:27  
evalica - (22:29): sdumitriu: yes  
sdumitriu - (22:29): Wait for an email in 2 minutes  
evalica - (22:29): k  
sdumitriu - (22:32): Sent  
evalica - (22:32): got it  
evalica - (22:34): look very nice  
evalica - (22:34): I think maybe you should add a date for the version - and you could also have a footer with something: This message was generated with XWiki ...  
evalica - (22:34): I don't see any image - but it's clean  
evalica - (22:35): also I think you don't have the title of the page  
evalica - (22:35): I mean H1  
sdumitriu - (22:35): Yes  
sdumitriu - (22:36): Thanks for the feedback  
evalica - (22:36): you should test also with comments - if the work  
evalica - (22:36): no  
evalica - (22:36): np
